name: Counterfind
description:
In this small-scale but nonetheless serious simulator, you're tasked with studying a large quanity of suspicious seized cash, to look for counterfeits. Consult your references and analyse each note looking for defects, making sure to process them all before time runs out!

Produced by one person (me) in just five days, for the 7th Official Brackeys Game Jam, and its theme "It Is Not Real".

GitHub repository: https://github.com/CptnFabulous/BrackeysGameJam2022-Counterfind
